attributes.action: Repeal the undemocratic act of union of 1707 and restore the independence of the Kingdom of scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 1707 an act was passed in both the scottish and english parliments which dissolved both parliments and engaged Scotland and England in 300 years of an unequal and undemocratic union, i put it to the prime minister to give an undertaking to have a ballot of the people taken of both Kingdoms as to the future of the union.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
